Minnesota artist Kellie Rae Theiss has dedicated her life to observing and painting nature. Most of the year she can be found at her Turtle-hill Studio, near Prairie Lake in the north woods of Minnesota. Her reverent and intimate paintings capture the spirit, beauty, and wonder of natureâ€™s blessings.
